NY governor signs bills requiring ads to disclose AI-generated performers and mandating consent of heirs to use a deceased person's likeness commercially  —  The New York bill requires anyone producing or creating an ad to identify if it includes AI generated synthetic performers.

We are now tracking a deal at Walmart that drops Acer’s 2025 Nitro V 16 gaming laptop with an RTX 5050 GPU down to $599 shipped. This AMD-powered machine typically goes for $899, so you’re looking at a $300 discount on it today. This particular notebook dropped to $629 last month ahead of the Black Friday sale, but today’s deal shaves an additional $30 off to mark a new best price to beat. This would be a great pick for anyone moving up from an older notebook or grabbing their first gaming laptop, and it delivers some serious value today at its discounted price. For context, a similarly specced Intel-based model is currently going for $950 at Best Buy, even after discounts. Head below for more details.

items.title: US senators want defense bill helicopter provision dropped
items.summary: WASHINGTON, Dec 11 - The chair of the Senate Commerce Committee and the panel's top Democrat on Thursday pushed to revise an annual defense bill to bolster military helicopter safety after a fatal American Airlines collision with an Army Black Hawk killed 67 people in January near Reagan Washington National Airport. items.title: Bulgaria faces turmoil after protests topple government on eve of euro entry
items.summary: Dec 11 (Reuters) - The resignation of Bulgaria's government on Thursday puts an end to an increasingly unpopular coalition but is likely to usher in a period of prolonged political instability on the eve of the Black Sea nation's entry into the euro zone. Read full story

items.title: Venezuelan lawmakers pave way for withdrawal from International Criminal Court
items.summary: Dec 11 (Reuters) - Venezuela's national assembly on Thursday unanimously voted to repeal a law which ratified the Rome Statute, paving the way for the country to withdraw from the International Criminal Court (ICC), which is investigating human rights abuses in the country. Read full story

items.title: Roundup: Türkiye ends year of monetary adjustments with rate cut as inflation cools
items.summary: ANKARA, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- Türkiye's central bank on Thursday made its last interest rate decision of the year, reducing the policy rate by 150 basis points, wrapping up a year marked by shifting economic pressures and a gradual decline in inflation. Read full story

items.title: IOC recommends unrestricted access for Russian and Belarusian athletes to international youth competitions
items.summary: LAUSANNE, Switzerland, Dec. 11 (Xinhua) -- The Olympic Summit announced Thursday to support the International Olympic Committee (IOC)'s recommendation that youth athletes with a Russian or Belarusian passport should no longer be restricted in their access to international youth competitions, in both individual and team sports. Read full story

items.title: Automate sleep-friendly routines and get a good night’s rest during the holidays with these Aqara smart home products
items.summary:
Smart home gadgets, as you probably already know, can do so much more than basic lighting tricks. In fact, they can be surprisingly effective at improving your sleep quality. With the right setup in place, you can create personalized bedtime routines that can help you effortlessly wind down and get a good night’s sleep. Aqara is one of the brands that is at the forefront of this, offering devices that work smoothly with Apple HomeKit, Amazon Alexa, and Google Home. They’re simple to use, thoughtfully designed, and packed with features to help you drift off more comfortably – especially during the holidays when you finally get a chance to unwind.

items.title: Ford and SK On are ending their US battery joint venture

items.title: This display-equipped 10-in-1 USB-C hub with see-through design is down to $59 (Reg. $100)
items.summary:
Over at Amazon, DOCKCASE’s official storefront is offering its Explorer Edition 10-in-1 USB-C hub for $59.39 shipped. Don’t forget to enter promo code IEO2SJW3 during checkout to see the discounted price. This display-equipped model typically goes for $100, and it’s now seeing a straight-up $41 discount. You can get this in black and silver finishes, and they’re both down to $59 today. They dropped to $70 earlier this year in August ahead of the fall Prime Day sale, but today’s deal steps it up with an additional $11 discount. This is the lowest price we have tracked for both of these USB-C hubs, and you can learn more about them in detail below.

more…

items.title: Today’s iOS app deals and freebies: MEGA MAN X, Street Fighter, Stair Quest, more
items.summary:
Your Thursday edition of the iOS game and app deals now live on the App Store awaits below. Today we have some standout classics from the Capcom library including MEGA MAN X, Ace Attorney Trilogy, and Street Fighter IV joined by titles like Stair Quest and Little Big Workshop. Just be sure to scope out the very best price ever on AirPods Pro 3 – they dropped to $199 this morning for the first time. We also have ongoing Black Friday lows on M4 Mac mini at $479 as well as a new Amazon low on Apple’s 2025 iPad Air Magic Keyboard and Apple Watch Series 11 still at $100 off. As for the apps, everything awaits below.
